Index

A B C D E F G I J L M N O P S T U V 
All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages|Constant Field Values

O

onActionAddAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This method is called when the user clicks the "Add Appointment" button at the bottom of the Add Appointment screen; it saves the user-input details as a new appointment record (in the database's Appointments table), and also brings the user back to the Appointments Table screen.
onActionAddCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
This method is called when the user clicks the "Add Customer" button at the bottom of the Add Customer screen; it saves the user-input details as a new customer record (in the database's Customers table), and also brings the user back to the Customers Table screen.
onActionDeleteAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
This method gets called whenever the "Delete" button on the Appointments Table screen is clicked by the user; it outputs a confirmation dialog box to to the user (asking if they are sure that they want to delete the appointment that they previously selected), and if the user clicks "OK", the appointment is deleted from both the database and the Appointments TableView.
onActionDeleteCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomersTableController
This method gets called whenever the "Delete" button on the Customers Table screen is clicked by the user; it outputs a confirmation dialog box to to the user (asking if they are sure that they want to delete the customer record that they previously selected), and if the user clicks "OK", the customer is deleted from the database (and since the Customers TableView pulls its contents directly from the database, the Customers TableView will reflect this deletion as well).
onActionDisplayAddAppointmentMenu(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
This method gets called whenever the "Add" button on the Appointments Table screen is clicked by the user; it switches the visible screen to the "Add Appointment" screen, from where the user can create a new appointment.
onActionDisplayAddCustomerMenu(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomersTableController
This method gets called whenever the "Add" button on the Customers Table screen is clicked by the user; it switches the visible screen to the "Add Customer" screen, from where the user can add a new customer.
onActionDisplayAllAppointments(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
This method gets called whenever the "All Appointments" radio button is selected; it populates the Appointments TableView with all appointments that are currently in the database.
onActionDisplayAppointmentsTable(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This method gets called whenever the "Back" button on the Add Appointments screen is clicked by the user; first, a confirmation dialog box is output to the user (asking the user if they are sure they want to leave the "Add Appointment" screen without saving their input); if they click "OK", this method switches the visible screen back to the "Appointments Table" screen.
onActionDisplayAppointmentsTable(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
 
onActionDisplayAppointmentsTable(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyAppointmentController
This method gets called whenever the "Back" button on the Modify Appointments screen is clicked by the user; first, a confirmation dialog box is output to the user (asking the user if they are sure they want to leave the "Modify Appointment" screen without saving their input); if they click "OK", this method switches the visible screen back to the "Appointments Table" screen.
onActionDisplayCustomersTable(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
This method gets called whenever the "Back" button on the Add Customer screen is clicked by the user; first, a confirmation dialog box is output to the user (asking the user if they are sure they want to leave the "Add Customer" screen without saving their input); if they click "OK", this method switches the visible screen back to the "Customers Table" screen.
onActionDisplayCustomersTable(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
 
onActionDisplayCustomersTable(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyCustomerController
This method gets called whenever the "Back" button on the Modify Customer screen is clicked by the user; first, a confirmation dialog box is output to the user (asking the user if they are sure they want to leave the "Modify Customer" screen without saving their input); if they click "OK", this method switches the visible screen back to the "Customers Table" screen.
onActionDisplayDivisionsOfSelectedCountry(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
This method is called when the user selects a country from the country combo box; it populates the division combo box with the first-level divisions of that selected country.
onActionDisplayDivisionsOfSelectedCountry(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyCustomerController
This method is called when the user selects a country from the country combo box; it populates the division combo box with the first-level divisions of that selected country.
onActionDisplayLoginScreen(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This method gets called whenever the "Sign out" button on the Add Appointment screen is clicked by the user; it outputs a confirmation dialog box asking the user if they are sure they want to sign out, and if the user confirms, then this method switches the visible screen to be the Login Screen once again.
onActionDisplayLoginScreen(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
This method gets called whenever the "Sign out" button on the Add Customer screen is clicked by the user; it outputs a confirmation dialog box asking the user if they are sure they want to sign out, and if the user confirms, then this method switches the visible screen to be the Login Screen once again (without saving any of the user input from the Add Customer screen).
onActionDisplayLoginScreen(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
This method gets called whenever the "Sign out" button on the Appointments Table screen is clicked by the user; it outputs a confirmation dialog box asking the user if they are sure they want to sign out, and if the user confirms, then this method switches the visible screen to be the Login Screen once again.
onActionDisplayLoginScreen(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomersTableController
This method gets called whenever the "Sign out" button on the Customers Table screen is clicked by the user; it outputs a confirmation dialog box asking the user if they are sure they want to sign out, and if the user confirms, then this method switches the visible screen to be the Login Screen once again.
onActionDisplayLoginScreen(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
 
onActionDisplayLoginScreen(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyAppointmentController
This method gets called whenever the "Sign out" button on the Modify Appointment screen is clicked by the user; it outputs a confirmation dialog box asking the user if they are sure that they want to sign out, and if the user confirms, then this method switches the visible screen to be the Login Screen once again.
onActionDisplayLoginScreen(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyCustomerController
This method gets called whenever the "Sign out" button on the Modify Customer screen is clicked by the user; it outputs a confirmation dialog box asking the user if they are sure they want to sign out, and if the user confirms, then this method switches the visible screen to be the Login Screen once again (without saving any of the user input from the Modify Customer screen).
onActionDisplayMainMenu(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
This method gets called whenever the "Back" button on the Appointments Table screen is clicked by the user; it switches the visible screen back to the "Main Menu" screen.
onActionDisplayMainMenu(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomersTableController
This method gets called whenever the "Back" button on the Customers Table screen is clicked by the user; it switches the visible screen back to the "Main Menu" screen.
onActionDisplayMainMenu(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginScreenController
This method displays the application's Main Menu upon the clicking of the "Sign In" button (if the user's username and password combination are valid); otherwise, an error dialog box is presented to the user and the Main Menu is not shown.
onActionDisplayModifyAppointmentMenu(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
This method gets called whenever the "Modify" button on the Appointments Table screen is clicked by the user; if the user selected an appointment from the Appointments TableView prior to clicking the "Modify" button, then this method switches the visible screen to the "Modify Appointment" screen, from where the user can make modifications to the appointment that they selected.
onActionDisplayModifyCustomerMenu(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomersTableController
This method gets called whenever the "Modify" button on the Customers Table screen is clicked by the user; if the user selected an appointment from the Customers TableView prior to clicking the "Modify" button, then this method switches the visible screen to the "Modify Customer" screen, from where the user can make modifications to the customer record that they selected.
onActionDisplayStatistics(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
This method is called whenever the "Statistics" button on the Appointments Table screen is clicked; it calls other methods that calculate and display three separate statistical reports as dialog boxes, and provides functionality to the "Next", "Back", or "Done" buttons on these dialog boxes.
onActionDisplayThisMonthsAppointments(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
This method gets called whenever the "This Month" radio button is selected by the user; it populates the Appointments TableView with all appointments in the database that are scheduled for the current month.
onActionDisplayThisWeeksAppointments(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
This method gets called whenever the "This Week" radio button is selected by the user; it populates the Appointments TableView with all appointments in the database that are scheduled for the current week (Sunday to Saturday, inclusive).
onActionUpdateAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyAppointmentController
This method is called when the user clicks the "Update" button at the bottom of the Modify Appointment screen; it replaces the old contents of the appointment record that the user was modifying with the new user-input details (which may or may not have been modified by the user).
onActionUpdateCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyCustomerController
This method is called when the user clicks the "Update" button at the bottom of the Modify Customer screen; it replaces the old contents of the customer record that the user was modifying with the new user-input details (which may or may not have been modified by the user).
onEnter(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginScreenController
This method displays the application's Main Menu upon the user pressing their "Enter" key while the cursor is either in the username text field or the password text field (assuming the user's username and password combination are valid); otherwise, if the combination is not valid, an error dialog box is presented to the user and the Main Menu is not shown.
openConnection() - Static method in class database_connection.DatabaseConnection
This method opens the connection to the database.
